Text:
Hi, while the download does contain 193 files, it seems that uite a few chapters are missing - it goes to 8 and then continues in the 20ies. Also the total mp3 size of the download is 333MB instead of 501MB as the info here says. Do you have any idea why?

I also wanted to ask if you had audiobooks 1 and 2 of the series. I'd very much appreciate an upload. Thanks!
